mapper.select: select sys_op_user_class_id, user_name, a.user_id, user_part, user_grade, user_phone, user_email, user_image, user_status, refresh_token from ( SELECT sys_op_user_class_id, user_name, user_id, user_pwd, user_part, user_grade, user_phone, user_email, user_image, user_remark, user_reg_date, user_status FROM did_busantp.dt_op_user WHERE user_status = 1 AND user_id = #{user_id} AND user_pwd = #{user_pwd}) as a left join did_busantp.oauth_token on a.user_id = oauth_token.user_id
